text:
Aww yeah! Let's learn English with the actor known 
as the nicest man in Hollywood, Keanu Reeves!

By the way, in case you're new here, 
we help you to learn fast English

without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles. Just like this fan,

who says he's highly improved his English from 
watching our lessons. So don't forget to hit that

Subscribe button and the Bell down below, so that 
you don't miss a single one of our new lessons.

Are you uninspired by your current learning 
routine? Or frustrated by not understanding

fast speaking natives? Then I highly 
recommend our Fluent with Friends Course.

In this 48-week course you will learn 
with the first 2 seasons of Friends.

You'll receive PDF Power Lessons every 
week, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community 
and so much more! And did you know you can try

it right now for FREE with our 3-Part Masterclass! 
All you have to do is click up here or down in the

description box below to learn more and sign 
up now. We look forward to seeing you there!

If you're a fan of Keanu Reeves and classic 
movies, then I highly recommend you check

out this lesson that we made with the 
incredible movie The Matrix! You can

click up here or down in the description 
box below to watch that lesson next.
